name: HIVE
body:
### Welcome to HIVE Pages.
HIVE is a visualization environment for various hardware platforms.

### More information
Please visit our outreach site [http://www.cenav.org](http://www.cenav.org)

### Contributors
Kenji Ono, Riken AICS
Jorji Nonaka, Riken AICS

Hiroyuki Yoshikawa, Fujitsu East
